TextBlock.Text: NAME: Why is this warp transmitter empty?
NAME2: This warp transmitter used to lead to <color=orange>Hidden Light</color>, the invisible star orbiting [SP NAME].
NAME2: The warp core from this transmitter was repurposed to power [SP NAME]'s warp core.
NAME2: <color=orange>Hidden Light</color>'s orbit is marked by the purple energy ring around [SP NAME].

NAME2: The white hole core on <color=orange>Hidden Light</color> was also planned to be used for [SP NAME]'s warp core, but was broken. It is now at [ _____ ], along with another white hole core that was accidentaly made too big.
